items.hint: You were ordered not to drink for a certain period of time
items.label: Alcohol abstinence

items.hint: You were given treatment to help you stop drinking
items.label: Alcohol treatment

items.hint: You were helped to change any dangerous or unwanted behaviour
items.label: Behavioural change programme

items.hint: You were ordered to stay indoors at certain times
items.label: Curfew

items.hint: You were given treatment to help you stop taking drugs
items.label: Drug rehabilitation

items.hint: You were ordered to stay away from a certain place
items.label: Exclusion requirement

items.hint: You were ordered not to travel to any other country
items.label: Foreign travel prohibition

items.hint: You were banned from doing something, such as using the internet or going to football matches
items.label: Prohibition

items.hint: You were referred to community volunteers and the youth offending team (YOT)
items.label: Referral order

items.hint: You were given activities to help with your rehabilitation
items.label: Rehabilitation activity requirement (RAR)

items.hint: You were ordered to live somewhere for a certain length of time
items.label: Residence requirement

items.hint: You were ordered to do community work without being paid
items.label: Unpaid work
